ygData.subject: Re: Why do they want Bronze?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You are flat wrong.  Period.  Reinforced leather does not *even* begin to compare to even banded, much less plate.  No way.  Not even close. Having said
ygData.messageBody:
--- John Danielson <clu@...> wrote:
> This what reinforced leather is for. AC of banded,
> absoprtion of plate (maybe better, gotta spearmint),
> and a HELL of a lot lighter.

You are flat wrong. Period. Reinforced leather does
not *even* begin to compare to even banded, much less
plate. No way. Not even close.

Having said that, reinforced leather is great for
non-banded classes (druids, etc..) Problem is, there
are very few tailors with sufficient skills.

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
